segments.text: My major is Business Administration , I am especially interested in Marketing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I received my Bachelor degree in Business Administration .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What course did you like best ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Project Management . I was very interested in this course when I was a student . And I think it's very useful for my present work .

segments.text: Do you feel that you have received a good general training ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I have studied in an English training program and a computer training program since I graduated from university . I am currently studying Finance at a training school .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: English and computer skills are comparatively important to this post , especially in the starting period . Wharfs your ability in these two fields ?

segments.text: I passed college English Test Band - 4 , with good skill in listening , speaking , reading and writing .
